youtube.manage-and-add-your-youtube-accounts: Manage and add your YouTube accounts
youtube.try-account: Try add a YouTube account first!
youtube.delete-account-desc: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
youtube.permanently-deleted: The account will be permanently deleted!
youtube.limit-of-connection: You’ve reached the limit of connection
youtube.your-current-plan-level: Your current plan: {{level}} only supports connecting to {{count}} YouTube accounts
youtube.upgrade-your-plan: Please upgrade your plan to connect to more YouTube accounts

plan-overview.title: Getting a Gold Button with a Smart Plan
plan-overview.des1: Get 2 months free with annual subscription to any plan
plan-overview.des2: So Sign up for an annual plan and get 2 months free!
plan-overview.12-languages: Get peace of mind by translating your video into up to 12 languages.
plan-overview.40-languages: Meet your goals with up to 5 connected accounts and 40 languages.
plan-overview.unlimited-languages: Achieve your desires with our unlimited plan!
plan-overview.12-languages-checked: Translation language options up to 12
plan-overview.40-languages-checked: Translation language options up to 40
plan-overview.restartMembershipDesc: As requested, your membership will be canceled on

translator.translateVideos: Translate videos from your YouTube accounts
translator.selectVideoInlist: To select a video or move to next step, simply click on a video from the list below.
translator.title: Title
translator.publishingVideos: Please wait... Publishing Videos details on YouTube
translator.publishingCaptions: Please wait... Publishing Captions on YouTube
translator.waitingDesc: It can take upto 60 seconds for the action to complete
translator.waitingTranslateDesc: It can take up to 5 minutes to finish translating this video

language-limit-popover.title: Your plan’s limit of translation
language-limit-popover.please-upgrade: Please upgrade your plan to select more languages
language-limit-popover.achieve-your-desire: Achieve your desires with our unlimited plan!

finish-updating-modal.to-view: to view the Video on YouTube

translator.subtext-start: To view the video title/description in different languages, make sure you
translator.subtext-highlight: open YouTube in a private page/tab of your browser
translator.subtext-continue: From the top right menu of YouTube (3 dots) select the Language in which you want to see the title and the description.
translator.subtext-second: If you are logged in with an account, there is a chance the title/description won’t show in a different language, that’s why we recommend to open a private tab.

caption.subtext-start: To view the video Captions in different languages,
caption.subtext-highlight: click in the YouTube player in the bottom right on the captions button
caption.subtext-continue: and select the captions that you want to see.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.acceptText: By clicking Place Order, you accept the Terms & Conditions
checkout.noteContent1: We currently only support Visa, MasterCard and American Express cards.
checkout.noteContent2: If you are unable to add your card, please contact us.

downgrade.descripiton1: Your new plan: {{level}} only supports connecting to {{number}} YouTube account
downgrade.description2: Please select the account you will use in the next period:
downgrade.noteContent: Other YouTube accounts will be deleted when the new plan is applied
downgrade.description3: You’ll still be able to use your current membership privileged until then.

cancelPlan.title: Confirm cancel your membership
cancelPlan.noteContent: All your YouTube accounts will be deleted when the membership cancellation takes effect.
cancelPlan.description: Your membership will be cancelled on
cancelPlan.description2: You’ll still be able to use your current membership privileged until then.

success.title: Payment Success
success.description: Congratulations, your subscription plan has been updated.

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.description: We encountered an error while processing your payment.

success.title: We’ve changed your plan
success.description: You’ll still be able to use your current membership privileged until then.
Your access to all features in the current plan of SubTube will end on
success.title: We’re sorry to say goodbye

renewPlan.title: Your plan has not been renewed
renewPlan.noteContent: If the plan has not been renewed within 30 days, all YouTube accounts connected to your account will be disconnected.
renewPlan.description: Your plan has not been renewed from {{date}}.
renewPlan.description2: To continue using the service, please renew your package manually!

reminder.title: Payment Reminder
reminder.description1: Your current plan will end soon!
reminder.description2: Please renew the plan before {{date}} to keep using the services.
